scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="statusCode" labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode" defaultValue="200" dataType="int"> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_200" value="200" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_400" value="400" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_401" value="401" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_403" value="403" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_404" value="404" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_409" value="409" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_410" value="410" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_429" value="429" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_500" value="500" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_501" value="501" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_502" value="502" /> <propertyValue labelResourceName="Options_StatusCode_503" value="503" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Description">Enables setting the HTTP status code to a custom value.</resource> <resource name="Name">Custom HTTP Status Code</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode">HTTP Status Code</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_200">OK (200)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_400">Bad Request (400)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_401">Unauthorized (401)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_403">Forbidden (403)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_404">Not Found (404)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_409">Conflict (409)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_410">Gone (410)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_429">Too Many Requests (429)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_500">Internal Server Error (500)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_501">Not Implemented (501)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_502">Bad Gateway (502)</resource> <resource name="Options_StatusCode_503">Service Unavailable (503)</resource> </language>
